desc:
Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT
Summon a Totem that damages enemies around it every 0.4s.
Mana Cost: 30
Total Damage: 12% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 6%)
 (Air: 6%)
Duration: 30s
Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Double your Main Attack's beam speed and increase your damage when using a relik.
Reduce the Mana cost of Totem by 10.

Your Totem will deal damage where it lands.

Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 120%)
 (Fire: 30%)
Area of Effect: 3.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Reduce your Main Attack's spread, and increase its beam speed by +33%.
Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-RIGHT </br> Leap towards your Totem. </br> Mana Cost: 15
Your Main Attack will emit +2 extra beams. (Increases your overall damage by +65%)

Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-LEFT
Emits a rapid projectile that will explode and knock enemies away. (Hold shift to pull instead)
Mana Cost: 30
Total Damage: 130% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 80%)
 (Earth: 30%)
 (Thunder: 20%)
Range: 18 Blocks
Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Reduce the Mana cost of Haul by 5.

Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-LEFT
Radiates an aura from your Totem that damages enemies.
Mana Cost: 40
Total Damage: 180% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 150%)
 (Water: 30%)
Range: 16 Blocks

Casting Totem while looking at an existing Totem will instead shove it forwards, dealing damage to any enemy it crashes into. (Sneak to reverse its direction)

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 90%)
 (Air: 30%)
Range: ~12 Blocks
Area of Effect: 3.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks. </br> </br>Earth Damage: +2-4 </br>Earth Damage: +20%
Increase your base damage from all Air attacks. </br> </br>Air Damage: +3-4 </br>Air Damage: +15%
Increase your damage from all Water attacks. </br> </br>Water Damage: +2-4 </br>Water Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks. </br> </br>Thunder Damage: +1-8 </br>Thunder Damage: +10%
Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks. </br> </br>Fire Damage: +3-5 </br>Fire Damage: +15%

Hitting the ground after using Haul will deal damage around you.

Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 110%)
 (Earth: 40%)
Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Increases Uproot and Haunting Memory's range. Hitting Totem with either will reset its duration. </br> </br>Range: +6 Blocks

While mid-air, your Totem will leave a streak of rain that damages enemies under it every 0.4s.

Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 30%)
 (Water: 30%)
Duration: 6s
Area of Effect: 3.5 Blocks (Line-Shaped)

Aura will travel much faster and deal additional damage.

Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
 (Thunder: +20%)

Uproot becomes lashing flames, which hit 3 times but will not explode or knockback enemies.
Haunting Memory will no longer attach Masks to enemies.

Total Damage: -50% (of your DPS, for Uproot, per hit)
 (Damage: -15%)
 (Earth: -30%)
 (Thunder: -15%)
 (Fire: +10%)

Your Totem will summon 1 Puppet every 3s. (Max 3) They throw knives at nearby enemies every 0.5s.

Total Damage: 20% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 16%)
 (Air: 2%)
 (Earth: 2%)
Duration: 30s
Range: 16 Blocks

When casting Uproot, instead wear the Mask of the Lunatic. (Shift + Uproot to remove it) </br> While wearing this Mask, the mana cost of Aura is decreased and you gain damage bonus at the cost of reduced resistance. </br> Mana Cost: -30% </br>Effects: +35% Damage Bonus to Self    -20% Resistance Bonus to Self

Your Totem will siphon 2% of your health every 0.4s and transfer it into a Blood Pool. </br> Aura will spend 15 points of Blood Pool to deal +35% damage and heal all allies. </br> </br>Total Heal: 25% (of your max health)
Enemies hit by Nature's Jolt will be slowed down. </br> </br>Effect: 40% Slowness to Enemies </br>Duration: 3s
Reduce the Mana cost of Aura by 5.
Reduce the Mana cost of Uproot by 5.
Once Aura reaches its maximum range, it will bounce back and deal its effects a second time. </br> Sacrificial Shrine will heal 35% less health.
Increase your Max Puppets by +1.

When you switch Masks, throw your previous one forwards. If it hits an enemy, it will attach for a short time and debuff them. You will not receive the effects of your Mask until it returns.

Total Damage: 240% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 240%)
Range: 14 Blocks
Effects: -15% Damage Bonus to Enemies (from Lunatic) -15% Resistance Bonus to Enemies (from Fanatic) +30% Slowness to Enemies (from Heretic)
Duration: 4s
Increase your Totem's area of effect. </br> </br>Area of Effect: +4 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
If you are outside of your Totem's range, Haul will teleport you to it.

When your Puppets have 3s left, they will charge towards enemies at high speed and explode.

Total Damage: 200% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 150%)
 (Fire: 50%)
Area of Effect: 3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
When wearing the Mask of the Lunatic, killing an enemy with Aura will cast a new Aura at its location, dealing -50% of its damage.
Increase your maximum Blood Pool by +30 points.

Hitting enemies with Uproot or Haunting Memory will inflict them with Whipped. Your Summons will focus Whipped enemies and deal additional damage to them. </br> </br>Effect: +20% Damage Bonus to Summons </br>Duration: 10s
Increase your maximum Puppets by +2.

When casting Uproot, instead wear the Mask of the Fanatic. (Shift + Uproot to remove it) </br> While wearing this Mask, the mana cost of Totem is decreased and you gain resistance at the cost of reduced walk speed. </br> Mana Cost: -65% </br>Effects: +35% Resistance to Self    -35% Walk Speed to Self

Flaming Tongue gains +1 hit, and now inflicts enemies with Bleeding for +1.5s per hit. (Max 6s)
Haunting Memory will instead inflict +6s of Bleeding.
Bleeding enemies take damage every 0.5s. Bleeding damage dealt within Totem's range also adds +0.8 points to your Blood Pool.

Total Damage: +0% (of your DPS, for Uproot, per hit)
 (Damage: -5%)
 (Thunder: +5%)

Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS, from Bleeding)
 (Damage: 60%)
Your Totem will give all players in its range a damage bonus. </br> </br>Effect: +20% Damage Bonus to Allies
Switching between Masks 2 times will give you 30 Mana.
Increase your maximum Totems by +1. Totem and Aura will do 40% less damage. </br> Regeneration and Sacrificial Shrine will heal 40% less health.
Reduce the mana cost of Totem. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Enemies hit by Aura will be pulled towards your totem.

Total Damage: +30% (of your DPS)
 (Air: +30%)
Every 0.4s, your Totem will heal every player within its range. </br> </br>Total Heal: 1% (of your max health)
Reduce the mana cost of Haul. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Reduce the mana cost of Aura. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Increase Totem's damage.

Total Damage: +4% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +4%)

Nearby Bleeding enemies will take damage for every 2% Health you lose. (Max 10 activations at once)

Total Damage: 65% (of your DPS, per 2% health)
 (Damage: 45%)
 (Air: 20%)
Range: 20 Blocks
While wearing the Mask of the Fanatic, your Totem will shatter upon impacting the ground, rapidly triggering 8s worth of its effects. </br> Regeneration will only heal 50% of its usual amount.
Masquerade will trigger after -1 less Mask switch. Reduces mana  bonus by -10.

Totem will summon an Effigy that will attack enemies and push them towards the nearest Totem every 0.5s. The Effigy will live for as long as its Totem does.
Each Totem will summon its own Effigy. Each additional Effigy summoned will decrease all Effigy damage by 0.8x.

Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 75%)
 (Fire: 25%)
Vision: 18 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

When casting Uproot, instead wear the Mask of the Heretic. (Shift + Uproot to remove it) </br> While wearing this Mask, the mana cost of Haul is reduced and you gain walk speed at the cost of reduced damage. </br> Mana Cost: -50% </br>Effects: +80% Walk Speed to Self    -10% Damage Bonus to Self

Casting Totem while holding shift will spend 30 points of Blood Pool (per Totem) to call upon 4 nightmarish tentacles.
Tentacles debuff bleeding enemies in range and each deal damage to one enemy every 2s.
Blood Connection turns into a teleport while Eldritch Call is active.

Total Damage: 840% (of your DPS, per strike)
 (Damage: 640%)
 (Thunder: 100%)
 (Fire: 100%)
Area of Effect: 18 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Effects: +40% Slowness to Enemies -15% Resistance Bonus to Enemies
Duration: 10s
Increases Aura's healing by +0.3% for every 1% </br>Water Damage Bonus you have from items. (Max +75%)
Increase your maximum Blood Pool by +30 points. Increase your maximum Bleeding duration by +1.5s.
Uproot will slow down enemies. </br> </br>Effect: 40% Slowness to Enemies </br>Duration: 3s

When switching to the Mask of the Heretic, you and your allies are given a speed boost. -15% of the bonus decays every second. </br> </br>Effect: +60% Walk Speed to Allies </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 8s

Increase Bleeding damage.

Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +20%)
When any player takes damage within your Totem's range, 35% of the damage taken proportional to your maximum health is added to your Blood Pool. (Max 10 points per hit)

Greatly reduce Main Attack spread.
Your Main Attack will now inflict enemies with Bleeding for +0.25s per beam.
Bleeding enemies take damage every 0.5s. Bleeding damage dealt within Totem's range also adds +0.8 points to your Blood Pool.

Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS, from Bleeding)
 (Damage: 60%)
Hitting your Puppets with Main Attack will cause them to lose 2s of their duration per beam and give them a damage boost. </br> </br>Effect: +10% Damage Bonus to Puppets </br>Duration: 2s

When switching to the Mask of the Fanatic, you and your allies are given a temporary resistance buff. </br> </br>Effect: 70% Resistance Bonus to Allies </br>Duration: 2s </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 8s

Increase Twisted Tether's damage.

Total Damage: +25% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +25%)
Increase your maximum Totems by +1. Totem and Aura will do 50% less damage. </br> Regeneration and Sacrificial Shrine will heal 50% less health.
Aura will temporarily increase your Summons' attack speed. Players hit will gain +2 mana. </br> </br>Effect: +30% Attack Speed to Summons </br>Duration: 2.5s

desc: While wearing the Mask of the Heretic, your Totem will move towards you, unless you are within its range.

When wearing the Mask of the Heretic, Haul will instead bounce you off the ground 3 times at an increasing speed and damage nearby enemies.
Frog Dance does not require Totem to be used.

Total Damage: 200% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 150%)
 (Water: 50%)
Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

When switching to the Mask of the Lunatic, reduce the defenses of nearby enemies. </br> </br>Effect: -15% Resistance Bonus to Enemies </br>Duration: 3s </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 8s
Increase your maximum Blood Pool by +30 points. Increase your maximum Bleeding duration by +1.5s.
When you or your Summons kill an enemy, gain +1 Max Puppets for 15s. (Max +8)

Casting Aura while holding shift will rally all active Puppets to your side, granting them increased attack speed and accuracy. </br> Your Main Attack deals 3% more damage for each rallied Puppet. </br> While not rallied, your Summons' attacks will build up the duration of this ability by +0.1s per attack. (Max 30s) </br> </br>Effect: +25% Attack Speed to Puppets
Your Hummingbirds' passive effects are improved. </br> </br>Effects: +20% Walk Speed to Self    +2 Jump Height to Self

Summon 2 Hummingbird Carvings which fly around you, passively granting a walk speed buff. Casting Haul while holding shift will temporarily send your Hummingbirds to attack nearby enemes, rapidly piercing through them every 0.25s. Casting it again will call them back early. While they are attacking, your Hummingbirds will not apply their passive effects to you. (Duration: 10s)

After saving 150 mana from your Masks' mana reductions, switching Masks will cause you to become Awakened for 25s, giving you the upsides of all Masks at once with no downsides. </br> Switching to an attached Mask while Awakened will immediately recall the Mask back to you.

Casting Uproot or Haunting Memory while holding shift will spend 70 points of Blood Pool to cast a destructive beam that chains between enemies and allies, and damages enemies every 0.2s.
You and any allies within the beam will receive +2% Overhealth per hit. Bonus health decays over 20s.

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 100%)
 (Water: 20%)
Duration: 5s
Range: 24 Blocks
Reduce the mana cost of Uproot. </br> Mana Cost: -5
